system.requirements:
Tier 3; Jaded, Resistance (Fear), WP 45
Aptitudes: Willpower, Defence
system.effect: Character can subtract their Willpower Bonus from the number of Degrees of Failiure they suffer on any failed Fear Test. If this reduces the number to 0 or less, they count as passing the Fear Test with 1 degree of success.

description.value: Character can subtract their Willpower Bonus from the number of Degrees of Failiure they suffer on any failed Fear Test. If this reduces the number to 0 or less, they count as passing the Fear Test with 1 degree of success.
